Title: Warm Winds and Water
Description:
Kirygosa wrote me after leaving Stranglethorn some years ago. She said it was beautiful and balmy, but not very quiet. I presume--and hope--she has found peace in Pandaria.

If I am honest with myself, I should not be surprised that she hasn't answered the Isles' call. Yet, we must do our duty and seek her out. If I am doubly honest with myself, I would have any excuse to see her again.

Let us take a break from these chilly winds and visit the Jade Forest.
ObjectivesText: Find Kirygosa in The Jade Forest in Pandaria.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Kirygosa in Dawn's Blossom in The Jade Forest.

Objectives.Text: Take the portal from Azure Archives to The Jade Forest
